price: 92. Moïse était venu vous apporter les preuves évidentes. En son absence, pourtant, vous avez pris le Veau pour idole, et vous étiez injustes.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ جَآءَكُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ ثُمَّ ٱتَّخَذۡتُمُ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ وَأَنتُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jāakum mūsā bil-bayināti thumma ittakhadhtumu al-ʿij'la min baʿdihi wa-antum ẓālimūna
